title: Unboxing AI: TheSomnium Files - NirvanA Initiative Collector's Edition :: Discussion of Both Games

media:group.media:title: Unboxing AI: TheSomnium Files - NirvanA Initiative Collector's Edition :: Discussion of Both Games
media:group.media:description:
My unboxing encompasses a discussion of both the first AI Somnium game and this sequel. There are short clips (my recordings) interspersed to illustrate various gameplay points.
I have taken great care to keep any spoilers down to an absolute minimum.
Please note that there are a few gameplay scenes that contain disturbing murder images.

Time Stamps:
00:00 Intro
01:12 The pre-order & cancellation saga
09:38 Visual Novel with a difference!
10:12 2 short game clips
12:20 game clip: psyncing, Heal Mizuki (1st Somnium Files)
13:25 Half corpse mystery (clip)
14:50 Game setting Tokyo 
15:15 Case Files info
15:48 Psyncing
16:00 Somnium - the Dreamworld
18:35 Kotaro Uchikoshi - writer
20:06 Opening box!
20:45 Aiba in Dreamworld
21:30 other items : game, soundtrack, artbook
23:00 Can I play Nirvana Initiative without playing the first game?
24:44 The "Spoiler dialogue options" choices (screenshot)
25:30 Artbook pages
27:10 Aiba figure
28:50 That's it! Final observations on visual novels
30:42 First game is on GamePass
31:07 Wrap-up

AI: The Somnium Files Nirvana Initiative is rated M (Mature 17+) by the ESRB and PEGI 16 for PAL regions. My video is therefore NOT suitable for children as per the COPPA legislation.

Background Music: from the Nirvana Initiative OST

#VisualNovel #aithesomniumfiles #Uchikoshi
